column2: How much experience do you have with using Virtual Reality (VR) glasses? (1- None, 3 - Neutral, 6- A lot)
column3: Were the tasks mentally demanding? (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- Very demanding)
column4: Were the tasks physically demanding? (Uncomfortable movements or positions, overexertion, etc.) (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- Very demanding)
column5: Did you have to put in a lot of effort to carry out the tasks? (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- A lot of effort)
column6: How frustrated, stressed, or irritated did you feel? (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- A lot)
column7: The interactions seemed easy to use (1- Very easy, 3 - Neutral, 6- Very difficult)
column8: The interactions demotivated me from using the application (1- Not at all, 3 - Neutral, 6- A lot)
column9: The interactions are understandable and easy to learn (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- Very understandable and easy to learn)
column10: The interactions seemed friendly and suitable for my limitations (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- Very friendly and suitable)
column11: I found it difficult to grab, release, move around, and add products (1- Very little, 3 - Neutral, 6- Very difficult)
column12: I would like to use these interactions frequently if I had to use the application (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column13: I think I would need help from a technically knowledgeable person to use the system (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column14: I find the system very cumbersome to use (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column15: I felt very safe using the system (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column16: I felt very immersed in the virtual environment (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column17: I felt general discomfort or dizziness (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column18: I ended up with a headache (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column19: I felt blurry vision or eye fatigue (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
column20: I felt tired (1- Strongly disagree, 3 - Neutral, 6- Strongly agree)
